mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, star, comment_group, deleted, LECTURE_REVIEW.regdate, profile FROM LECTURE_REVIEW INNER JOIN users ON LECTURE_REVIEW.writer=users.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group} ORDER BY comment_group ASC, num ASC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{limit}
